column4: Is this my video card? "01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: S3 Inc. ProSavage KM133" this is out put from lspci
ah thats a troublesome card ive heard
yeah. it worked in 6.06 fine. Now I have 6.10 and it is junk

Yeah I got 800x600 resolution. It is too low. I tried to fix it by running the auto detector again and I got in an endless log-in screen loop. Same thing happend when I edited xorg.conf to use 1024x768
you might google that card and see if there are some funky settings that work best in the xorg.conf file.  other than that the only thing i know about it is hearing a few friends complain about em
how could it work in 6.06 and not now? maybe I should use a 6.06 live cd and check the settings
updated drivers maybe?  personally im sticking with 6.06 for a while anyway :)
thanks for the info. can you tell me what is the name of the card. I mean, what part of this line is the name I should search? 01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: S3 Inc. ProSavage KM133
s3 used to be a cool company for cards in the day
unless something has changed last few years

I am gonna try out that link you sent me, but I also searched the card name and there wasn't so many hits, so I was wondering if there is a different way to refer to this card? savage? or vega? Do you know what I mean?
i normally think of it as an s3 card or savage i mean yours is a prosavage. not sure of diff
